Portal is a first person puzzle game with a great story; the multiplayer is pretty good, too.

Portal2 is incredibly fun & entertaining, a game that you can replay over & over. The problem solving aspects have unique twists moreover surprises from the original with the addition of a hilarious plot.

Puzzles start off relatively easy and get harder with new elements introduced as you progress. The best part is the story line and the genuinely funny comments voiced by everyone's favourite bristolian comedian - Steven Merchant.
сюжет прикольный, капиротив весёлый, не зря потратил деньги советую
spoko taka nie za droga a to sie liczy, inflacja tego typu, na promocji  nie więcej niz 15zł
really good but i need that portal 3

This is a true classic, and proof that a solid idea is more important than flashy graphics. That said, the graphics still hold up, even though the game is 11 years old. It's a clean and neat design, taking a lot of atmosphere from the Half Life series. No pixelated textures. With all settings maxed out, it looks great and there's not a single frame lagging. It is also very funny!
The game is, with a few tricky exceptions, pretty easy to run through. Portal Reloaded is a different matter. Damn, it's hard!
good game on xbox and pc

This game is good, but better when you start messing around with it

Одно из главных творений Valve, оно действительно заслуживает свое почётное место в мире головоломок.
Нет, portal не ломает мозг до невозможности, но его запоминающаяся история и юмор делают его уникальной игрой!
its basically half-life without the shooting. fun way to kill a bit of time.
Sehr unterhaltsames Rätseln und um die Ecke denken. Hier muss man wirklich über den Tellerrand schauen, um zum Ziel zu kommen. Schön sind auch die Monologe - wers gespielt hat, weiß wen ich meine :)

Ich habe das spiel durch und muss sagen ich bin absolut begeistert es verfolgt im kern immer noch das gleiche konzept wie sein vorgänger nur sind die puzzle schwerer und die lore des spiels wird sehr gut weiter geführt. Für es ist zwar nicht so gut für einen schnellen spas wo du anschaltest und einfach ein bischen spielzt wie in portal 1 aber es ist von der story und den mechaniken her auf jeden fall besser als im ersten teil

Hey, how are you?

Portal 2 is an amazing first person, gun, puzzle game. It is released in 2011 but definitely still holds up to date. The graphics are really good, the physics are sometimes a but wonky, but the story development is awesome! Although it is quite short, it still worth the money for only 1,59 euro, when not on sale. If you like puzzles, this game is for you. If you are a fan of lore, this game is for you. If you want to play with a friend a puzzle game, this game is for you!
Cheers.

i think this game is the best story game ever i have beaten it 3 times and played lots of online maps i tried finding Easter eggs in the game and it is fun 10/10. There are also many mods for the game. you should try this game. next i will try speed running the game.
i have a cave jhonson body pillow

This is a fantastic play. The story gives just enough for you to be engaged, but keeps its little secrets for you to discover on your own. The humor is top-tier, and has not aged a day. Excellent voice-acting on all of the characters. Co-op is fun too. Excited for more games from Valve in the future.
